data.title: Hollyoaks Cast List
data.meta_description: The British soap opera Hollyoaks is set in the fictional village of Hollyoaks, and its powerful storytelling has kept fans hooked  since its debut over ...
data.text:
The British soap opera Hollyoaks is set in the fictional village of Hollyoaks, and its powerful storytelling has kept fans hooked since its debut over two decades ago. This Channel 4 television series offers drama, romance, and suspense all rolled into one intense package. A major part of the show's success lies in the hands of the Hollyoaks cast members who breathe life into each character. The Hollyoaks cast list represents a diverse group of actors who create memorable moments for newcomers and longtime fans alike.

Crafting a top television series like Hollyoaks requires not only captivating storylines but also an array of skilled actors to portray the heroes and villains in the show. Each actor in the show does an excellent job diving into their respective roles. The result is a rich tapestry of unforgettable storylines brought to life by a passionate cast. This discussion acknowledges some exceptional individuals who have graced our screens as part of this beloved soap opera family.

Among these talented performers are Nick Pickard, Ashley Taylor Dawson, and Kieron Richardson - three remarkable figures who have contributed immensely to keeping Hollyoaks fresh and engaging throughout its run. Pickard stands out as one of the original cast members playing Tony Hutchinson since day one. Dawson portrayed Darren Osborne for over two decades; his magnetic performance sparks admiration across generations of loyal viewers. Another well-known Hollyoaks cast member is Kieron Richardson who plays Ste Hay - his powerful acting displays raw emotion that leaves audiences captivated. These noteworthy actors are just a few examples of the impressive talent within Hollyoaks.

The success of Hollyoaks rests on is actors who deliver riveting performances that keep fans coming back for more. As long as this top-notch ensemble continues their excellent portrayals, they will keep drawing viewers into the fictional world of Hollyoaks.

Ranked by

Hollyoaks, Hollyoaks Later, Hollyoaks: The Morning After the Night Before

Andrew Moss (born 1 June 1985) is an English television actor. He is currently best known for playing Rhys Ashworth in the Channel 4 soap opera Hollyoaks from 2005 to 2013. Moss returned to Hollyoaks in 2014 during Cindy's bipolar storyline and for playing Paul Cuthbert in BBC Daytime Soap Opera Doctors He has just finished playing the lead role Sam Wheat in the National tour of Ghost the Musical.

The Bill, Hollyoaks

Alexandra Louise Bastian (born 27 February 1982) is an English actress, known for her roles as Becca Dean in the Channel 4 soap opera Hollyoaks, Sally Armstrong in the ITV drama series The Bill and Becky Clarke in the BBC soap opera Doctors.

Hollyoaks, Hollyoaks Later, Hollyoaks: The Morning After the Night Before

Anthony Quinlan (born 16 October 1984) is an English actor, known for his roles as Gilly Roach in the Channel 4 soap opera Hollyoaks and Pete Barton in the ITV soap opera Emmerdale.

Ashley Slanina-Davies (born 18 December 1989) is an English actress born in Standish, near Wigan, who is notable for playing the role of Amy Barnes on Channel 4's teen soap, Hollyoaks. The role of Amy was Slanina-Davies' first major television role. The character of Amy Barnes developed in a number of storylines in Autumn 2006, which saw the character discover she had become pregnant and her family break up. Dealing with these issues saw the character act erratically, becoming involved in a car crash. Her character was written out of Hollyoaks in the episode broadcast on 8 August 2012, when she decides to take up a full-time course in Manchester. In May 2016 it was announced that Slanina-Davies would be returning to Hollyoaks on a full-time basis later in the year. In January 2017 Digital Spy reported that Slanina-Davies' character Amy was being killed off in a "devastating" and "dark" storyline that Hollyoaks will air in late March. Slanina-Davies continued to appear in flashbacks throughout the storyline of Amy's murder and last appeared on screen on 8th September 2017 when an unknown assailant seemingly killed her.

Hollyoaks, Hollyoaks Later, Starstreet

Philip Ashley Taylor Dawson (born 11 January 1982), known as Ashley Taylor Dawson, is an English actor and singer. He is best known for his role as Darren Osborne in the British Channel 4 soap opera Hollyoaks, in which he is one of the longest serving cast members, and for being a member of pop band allSTARS*.

Hollyoaks, Hollyoaks Later

Carley Anne Stenson (born 22 September 1982) is an English actress and singer, best known for playing Steph Cunningham in the Channel 4 series Hollyoaks nominated for Best Actress and Comedy Actress between 2000 and 2011. Stenson recorded a version of "If I Could Turn Back Time" and "About you now" which was featured in two separate episodes of the show to coincide with the death of Steph and her mother Frankie Osborne.Stenson's theatre work has included London West End theatre appearances as Princess Fiona in Shrek: The Musical; Elle Woods in Legally Blonde: The Musical; and as The Lady of The Lake in Spamalot. Stenson 'Christine Colgate' in the 2015/2016 UK tour of Dirty Rotten Scoundrels. She is currently playing the role Fantine in Les Misérables. To which has credited her with Award Noms. Carley also has an EP on Itunes
